docs.lead_paragraph: Snapchat is looking to raise as much as $500 million in a new funding round that would value the mobile messaging company at up to $19 billion, Bloomberg reported on Tuesday, citing a person with knowledge of the matter.

docs.abstract: Brands battling ad blockers and decline of broadcast advertising are increasingly paying celebrities and other so-called influencers to mention their products on social media; consumer advocates press Federal Trade Commission to better regulate ambiguity between genuine testimonial and paid advertisement.
